message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This product is truly top-of-the-line, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. However, $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
